name: Fight yourself! (3D, Action/Parcour)
description:
My entry  for the CCC game jam! :D

There are quite a lot of abilities and stuff, so make sure to read the tutorial text, even though real gamers normally don't do that...

Have fun playing!

-I made everything myself (graphics, code etc.) except for the music/soundeffects, but they're copyright free of course

-Only asset used (It's just a normal double sided shader )

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/double-sided-shaders-23087
